organization: Animal Aid Unlimited & Animal Aid Charitable Trust (AACT)
mission: Rescue and treat unowned street animals in Udaipur, and inspire community involvement in animal protection.
key_focus_areas: Education and Outreach for Animal Welfare

programs.name: CNVR Program
programs.description: Catch, neuter, vaccinate and release program for humane stray dog population management.

programs.name: Sterilisation Center Renovation
programs.description: Reopening and expansion of sterilization facilities post-COVID to prevent disease and overpopulation.

programs.name: Sanctuary Expansion
programs.description: Improved shelters for cows and bulls including better roofs and monsoon protection.

community_engagement.helpline: Nearly 100 calls per day reporting animal emergencies.
community_engagement.education: Guidance provided to helpline callers for post-recovery care and animal welfare.

future_plans.new_hospital: Plans for a state-of-the-art hospital with buffer land ensuring peaceful conditions for animals.

bank_transfers.international: Available in USD, EUR, GBP, AUD
